replies.replyComment: Ow sahoo. Kochchara unath ape eunta therenne naa. Thamath unge redda asse gihilla kiri powanawa. Api unekka maraaganna,  anakotaaganna onenaa. Ehema thamai mattu karanna one. Apa thathaagathayan wahanseth,    sangawahanse sanga wahanselata erehiwuu kala sanga bedaya athikireema hethuwen sanga neethiya panewwa. Ithin apith niyaayama yodaagathahoth unwa hondata mattu karanna puluwan niyatha lesama. Ekata ithin ape minissu oluwa kalpanaa karala wadakaranna one.

comments.comment:
Me video eka upload karapu  kenaatath mole nadda. Background music eka kana palenna daala. Ai ehema karanne.oygolloth hariyata deshapaaluwo wagene. 
Minisune balapiyau ea uthum shreshtaya dihaa. Enne nadda umbalatath ghaambeera hangeemak. 
Dannawada police mahaththayoo,  obathumaa gana  harima aadamnarai. Angea myluth kelin unaa obathumaage kriyaawa dakala. Mokda obathumaa ekale obe raajakaariyai, obe wagakeemai. Hisa namaa aachaara karanawa oba thumaage ea nirbheetha kamata. Muslim umbala danaganilla, ehema kiyanne ek jaathiyak wenuwenwath wenadeyak wenuwenwath  nowa, Umbala eun ea karana thrastha kriyaa wenuwen karana oya udagedi( help)deema nisaa kiyala. Kohomada umbalata ehema haiyak. Ethumanla awe rate siyalu denage  neethaya, saamaya, arakshaawa wenuwen kapawenna.  Oka thamai kiyanne umbala   serama ekai kiyala. Me rate inna paragathi kaalakanni paalakaini ai  thawath unta kiri powanawae, unge chandawalata kela hala hala. Nodakin. Hari dan  mokaada kiyapiyau kiyanne un hamooma ehema naa kiyala. Ethana inne okkoma saamaanya eunne. Ithin Dakkada unge tharama. Balu haththa. Ea police mahathun giye palli kadannawath wena magulakatawath  noweine. Giye mokakhoo saka shitha aaranchiyakata check karannane. Ithin para ballo thopi kohomada ehema check karanna denna epaa kiyanne. Eakiyanne thope palli kiyanne maha kunu wada karana hora gohaawal. Puluwannam mewata uththara deepiya oya mauliyo kiyana eun.  Mokada thaman        meheyawana palliwalata ena eunne othana gemata enne,  badha karanne.thawa umbala umbalage jaathiyama sudda karanawane neda  ? Dannam umbalage aagama gana kisima vishwaasayak naa apita saha thopi ekek ganawath kisima wishwaasayak thiyanne naa min idiriyata. Danagau sinhalaini yanna epaa ekekwath unge kisi kadawalata. Ethakota unta therei. Rate deshapaaluwo mewata nisi kriyaamaarga ganne nathnam rate janathawa api hari yamak karanna one. Api ayuda nogena buddhiyenui me awasthaawe katayuthu kalyuththe. Ea police mahathmayata erehiwa rajayenhoo wenathkauruhari katayuthu kaloth balaaganiyau wenadea. Yakoo kaalakanni wennathuwa, me rata thawath araajika karannenathiwa konda kelin thiyaagena theendu theerana ganilla rate yahapatha wenuwen. Therenne nathnam adumagaane ea police thumaawawath aadarshayata ganilla. Nirbheetha weyalla wahalun nowee.methumaage sewaya
comments.author: Prashan Silva

comments.comment: anna ohoma sinhayek vage  hema ekama hitiyanam.neda hoda.    ara 225ta vath nevenne nethi.  anika me vage velavaka police eken vitharak madi   army eken ekkan enna one.   yako thope  palli valata bomba gehuva nam thopi ohoma innavada nehene. anna a vage thama  anith unuth. eka nisa serch karanna dipan.   palliya ethulata giya kiyala monada venne.  ai  palli valata  muslim ayata vitharada yanna puluvan.    ova serch karanna dunne neththan ithin apita hithanna venne ubalath sambandai kiyala.    eka nisa   serch karanna denna.  ubala veraddak kare neththan  ithin ai baya venne.  palliyakata bombayak gehuva ethakota army eken police eken ethulata gihin balanna epa kiyalada kiyanne.  bohoma adaren kiyanne   api okkoma ekai.   okkoma ekama lee.     muslim kenek hospitel eke iddi sinhala kenekge ge lee  a muslim kenata denava neda. a sinhala manussaya uru mas kanavada nedda kiyala  balanne nehe neda. eka nisa le ekai agama vitharai venas. api okkoma minissu ban.     minissu.

Niyamai sahodaree.... balanna oyaalata apita therena dea ape parliament eke inna wal kaalakanni haththata therumgena eeta nisi katayuthu kalaanam mewan thathwayan athiwenne naane ada. Obath mewage lokuwata liyanawa kiyanne obe hithe thiyena kakkuma kochcharada kiyala therenawa. Namuth aththatama ape rate inna minisunge therum ganeema  thawama madi kiyalai mage hangeema. Ekane oya dewawalata hethuwana ea wenuwen gathikamkarana deshapaaluwo thawama ea putuwala inne. Eun nisaane me serama. Thambinge thathwayanam dan ithaama bhayanakai. Ea dea api ithaama seeruwen knaanaanwithawa therumgena min idiriyata katayuthu kala yuthui neda. Thanks for writing dear...
Mun dagalanne mokada nithiya katath ekai ekama rataka nithi 2k moko nithiya hariyata karanna nodenawanam munuth Anthawaden wenna puluwan
Tsubnamiya awoth okkma iwaray samagiyen inna balapalla
Ape jiwite apita watinawa Kare nattan ai baya , policy mhatearuni Yoda Bala Yoda wirya labewa owun nati karanna budusaranai
